posts.post_content:
One of these in this grade just sold in the memory lane sale for $11K:

[url]https://memorylaneinc.com/site/bids/bidplace?itemid=60674[/url]


I'm offering mine (super nice but does have a hard to see horizontal crease) for $10K OBO. delivered and insured.

"I'll take it" supersedes negotiations.
